T02D1191:310b-18: zhes pa snga ma dang gnyis ka la rtsa ba'i
T02D1191:310b-19: tshig bsgyur te 'dir ni lus spangs nas ni zhes
T02D1191:310b-20: bya ste rten dang brten pa'i rgyu mtshan no //
T02D1191:310b-21: rdo rje snying pos gsol pa //
T02D1191:310b-22: me ni gdol pa mor bshad de //
T02D1191:310b-23: zhes pa ni 'dod chags kyi phyag rgyar rigs pa
T02D1191:310b-24: las rin chen 'byung ldan gyi phyag rgyar ji ltar
T02D1191:310b-25: 'gyur zhe na / 'di ni rgyu la 'bras bu'i rgyas btab pa'i rigs pa ste /
T02D1191:310b-26: ser sna dang sha rgyu 'bras yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1191:310b-27: rdo rje snying pos gsol pa /
T02D1191:310b-28: gang phyir rlung gi g-yung mo nyid //
T02D1191:310b-29: ces pa ni g-yung mo la phrag dog gi phyag rgyas rigs pa yin no zhe na /
T02D1191:310b-30: 'dod chags kyi phyag rgyas phrag dog la 'debs pa
T02D1191:310b-31: ni 'bras bu la rgyu yis rgyas btab pa'i rgyu
T02D1191:310b-32: mtshan dang / de bzhin du goo r'i tsoo r'i
T02D1191:310b-33: la sogs sbyin gyis brlab bya rlob byed dang rten
T02D1191:310b-34: dang brten pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis snga ma dang 'dra'o
T02D1191:310b-35: mtshan dang / // ro langs ma dang gha sma
T02D1191:310b-36: r'i yang rgyu la 'bras bus rgyas gdab pa dang
T02D1191:310b-37: mtshan dang / // / 'bras bu la rgyu yis rgyas gdab pa snga ma bzhin sno //
T02D1191:310b-38: de nas gtor ma bstan pa'i phyir dgyes pa'i rdo rje ri gyur ma thag pa de'am /
T02D1191:310b-39: rdo rje 'dzin ni nye ba'i rgyu'i rang bzhin yin pas so //
T02D1191:310b-40: snyoms 'jug gnas pa ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje'o //
T02D1191:311a-0: lha nyid ni lus las 'byung ba ste zhu ba @311a * //
T02D1191:311a-2: sems can don gyi phyir ni 'chad par 'gyur pa'i phan yon no //
T02D1191:311a-3: gtor ma che ni ba lim ste stobs sam nus pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1191:311a-4: bdag med mas zhus pa ni gzhan gyi don du'o //
T02D1191:311a-5: ae wam rnam par bzhugs ni snyoms 'jug gi tshul lam //
T02D1191:311a-6: ae wam nges bzhugs ni sngon byung dang rjes su 'jug pa gnyis /
T02D1191:311a-7: sngon byung du bcom ldan 'das chos 'byung dang gzhal yas khang na gnas pa'o //
T02D1191:311a-8: rjes su 'jug pa ni sgrub pa dang mgron te /
T02D1191:311a-9: chos 'byung gi nang gi padma sum brtsegs bsgoms pa la dbus kyi lte ba la rang gnas so //
T02D1191:311a-10: 'dab ma la mgron dmigs par bya'o //
T02D1191:311a-11: yang gtor ma ae wam ste rlung dang me dang thod par sbyar ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1191:311a-13: aam h'um ae wam gyi brdas shes rab dang thabs su byas pa'o //
T02D1191:311a-14: gzhan dag ni de bzhin no //
T02D1191:311a-16: gtor ma sngar bshad pa'i bdud rtsi sbyangs pas bsgrubs nas chos kyi 'byung gnas nang du ni /
T02D1191:311a-18: dkar dang sngo dang dmar ba ste //
T02D1191:311a-19: steng du aom las tshangs la sogs //
T02D1191:311a-20: bar du h'um las brgya byin sogs //
T02D1191:311a-21: 'og tu a'a las mtha' yas sogs //
T02D1191:311a-22: padma'i mdog bzhin bskyed par bya //
T02D1191:311a-23: rang bzhin spyan drang gnyis med bstim //
T02D1191:311a-24: byin brlab dbang bskur tshul bzhin bya //
T02D1191:311a-25: steng la rtag pa mi bskyod dbus //
T02D1191:311a-26: 'og ma snang ba mtha' yas mtshan //
T02D1191:311a-27: ljags la rdo rjer brlabs la dbul //
T02D1191:311a-28: bsngo ba gnyis te zang zing chos //
T02D1191:311a-29: rim pa bzhin du bsngo ba'o //
T02D1191:311a-30: phan yon gnyis te re zhig dang //
T02D1191:311a-31: rgyun du byin pa'i phan yon no //
T02D1191:311a-32: yang sngar ni phyag rgya'i nge pa bsgrub pa las
T02D1191:311a-33: mkha' spyod ma la sogs pa rigs gsum du bya
T02D1191:311a-34: ba dang rigs kyi dbye ba go sla'o //
T02D1191:311a-37: // / da ni he ru ka phyag bcu drug pa las gsungs pa /
T02D1191:311a-38: de'i sgrub thabs bshad par zhus pa ni /
T02D1191:311a-39: phyag ni bcu drug zhal brgyad pa //
T02D1191:311a-40: zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang la bdag med mas gsol ba gdab pa'o //
T02D1191:311a-41: dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba can ni mi mgo
T02D1191:311a-42: lnga bcu'i phreng ba 'phyang ste 'du byed lnga bcu
T02D1191:311a-43: dag pa'o // gzhan dag ni rnam par dag pa sngar bshad zin to //
T02D1191:311a-44: bco lngas yongs su bskor ba'i bdag gi 'khor lo
T02D1191:311b-0: @311b khyed kyis bshad ni le'u brgyad par gsungs pa'o
T02D1191:311b-1: // khyod kyi dkyil 'khor ji ltar lags //
T02D1191:311b-3: bdag med ma la 'o mdzad nas //
T02D1191:311b-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni zhe sdang can dang chags pa can 'dul ba'i don to //
T02D1191:311b-5: 'khor lo ji ltar sngar gsungs pa //
T02D1191:311b-6: zhes pa'i don 'dir sgrub pa'i thabs ni sgrub pa pos gnas gang yang rung bar bya ba dang /
T02D1191:311b-8: srung ba mtshams dang chos kyi 'byung gnas bsgom pa snga ma ltar byas la /
T02D1191:311b-10: ji ltar rigs par byin za yi //
T02D1191:311b-11: zhes le'u brgyad pa ltar bsgoms pa /
T02D1191:311b-12: khyad par ni 'phar ma gcig pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i rjes la /
T02D1191:311b-13: tshangs pa dbang po nye dbang drag / la sogs pa sbyar la /
T02D1191:311b-14: dur khrod brgyad dang bcas pa'i dbus su bdud bzhi
T02D1191:311b-15: bsnol mar bsgoms nas aa la badzra zhes pa'i sngags
T02D1191:311b-16: brjod do // de skad du yang /
T02D1191:311b-17: mi mnyam med pas gru bzhi ste //
T02D1191:311b-18: dran pas dbang po sgo bzhi yin //
T02D1191:311b-19: rnam thar brgyad kyi ka ba ste //
T02D1191:311b-20: ting nge 'dzin bzhi yi kha khyer te //
T02D1191:311b-21: bsam gtan bzhi yi rta babs can //
T02D1191:311b-22: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis spras //
T02D1191:311b-23: nyon mongs che chung rnam dag pa'i //
T02D1191:311b-24: dra ba dang ni dra ba phyed //
T02D1191:311b-25: khams gsum bdag ni med pa yi ;
T02D1191:311b-26: / dur khrod brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes //
T02D1191:311b-27: tshangs pa la sogs mnan pa ni //
T02D1191:311b-28: tha mal rnam sbyong gzhal yas khang //
T02D1191:311b-29: rten gyi rnal 'byor drod gsher las skyes pa dang
T02D1191:311b-30: mthun pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnam par snang
T02D1191:311b-31: mdzad kyi rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1191:311b-32: de nas 'dod chags chen po rjes chags zhes bya ba shlo ka gcig sbyar te /
T02D1191:311b-33: de la dbus su nga yod ces bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang bskyed pa ste /
T02D1191:311b-34: a'a li zla ba k'a li nyi //
T02D1191:311b-35: sa bon nang du son gyur pa //
T02D1191:311b-36: de nyid sems dpa' zhes byar brjod //
T02D1191:311b-37: nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor khyab pa ni //
T02D1191:311b-38: rang gi lus mtshungs rnam par spro //
T02D1191:311b-39: bsdus nas snying gar dgug pa ni /
T02D1191:311b-40: yo gi zhe sdang bdag nyid ces //
T02D1191:311b-41: mngon par byang chub lnga sbyar te //
T02D1191:311b-42: zla ba med long ye shes ldan //
T02D1191:311b-43: bdun gyi bdun pa mnyam nyid ldan //
T02D1191:311b-44: rang lha'i sa bon phyag mtshan ni //
T02D1191:311b-45: so sor rtog pa yin zhes zer //
T02D1191:311b-46: de rnams gcig gyur bya nan tan //
T02D1191:311b-47: rdzogs pa chos dbyings dag pa'o //
T02D1191:312a-1: rje 'chang sku mdog dkar po gong du gsungs pa dang /
T02D1191:312a-2: 'og nas 'chad pa'i phyag mtshan la sogs pa dang ldan par bskyed la /
T02D1191:312a-3: rdo rje dang padma byin gyis brlabs la rjes su
T02D1191:312a-4: chags pa'i sngags brjod pa ni rjes su chags pa'i
T02D1191:312a-5: yan lag ste sgo nga skyes dang chos mthun pa'o
T02D1191:312a-7: grong khyer nyams dgar khyod dang //
T02D1191:312a-8: dga' bas shin tu rol pa las //
T02D1191:312a-11: dang po skyes bu bsam de nas //
T02D1191:312a-13: zhes gsungs te 'khor rjes su mthun pa'i byang chub
T02D1191:312a-14: pa lngas mngal skyes kyi sgong skyes dang 'dra bar
T02D1191:312a-15: bskyed de / gam tsam la sogs pa tshig gnyis sbyar ro //
T02D1191:312a-16: de'i don ni snying ga nas 'od 'phros sangs rgyas
T02D1191:312a-17: dang byang chub sems dpa' bkug nas zhal du zhugs
T02D1191:312a-19: srog dag pa'i lam nas byung ste /
T02D1191:312a-20: yum gyi padmar thig le de las sa bon brgyad du gyur pa dang /
T02D1191:312a-21: mdun gyi tshangs pa'i gdan steng du a'a li las
T02D1191:312a-22: zla ba k'a li las nyi ma de'i bar na
T02D1191:312a-23: gam // de las gri gug / de spro bsdu byas nas zhu ba las goo r'i bskyed de /
T02D1191:312a-24: dkar mo dbang po'i phyogs phyung nas //
T02D1191:312a-25: zhes bya ba la sogs pa sbyar ro //
T02D1191:312a-26: rlung gi mtshams su g-yung mo ni //
T02D1191:312a-28: rlung mtshams ni nyi ma'i steng na thags bzangs ris
T02D1191:312a-29: mnan pa'i steng du a'a li las zla ba k'a
T02D1191:312a-31: de gnyis bar du dam de las rdo rje la
T02D1191:312a-32: dam gis mtshan pa de spros bsdus nas zhu ba
T02D1191:312a-34: gzhan la yang de bzhin sbyar ro //
T02D1191:312a-36: zla ba nyid ma'i rab dbye bas //
T02D1191:312a-37: dkar mo la sogs rab tu grags //
T02D1191:312a-39: de ltar 'khor bskyed nas gtso bo 'gyur ba ni /
T02D1191:312a-40: de nas rdo rje chags chen las //
T02D1191:312a-41: rig ma bcas par zhu bar 'gyur //
T02D1191:312a-43: rgyu'i 'gyur ba ni sngar gyi thig le byang chub
T02D1191:312a-44: sems dpa' 'bru lngar gyur pa de gtso bo'i zhal
T02D1191:312a-45: du zhugs pas gtso bo dang rig mar bcas pa
T02D1191:312a-46: zhu'o ; / de nas rkyen gyis 'gyur ba ni //
T02D1191:312a-47: sna tshogs glu yi mchod pa las //
T02D1191:312a-48: de nas lha mo rnams kyi bskul //
T02D1191:312a-49: zhes pa ste mtshams kyi lha mos bskul te chos
T02D1191:312a-50: can rnam par dag pa 'byung ba bzhis 'bras bu
T02D1191:312a-51: bskyed pa dang / ngo bo tshad med pa bzhes
T02D1191:312b-0: sems can gyi don byed pa dang las @312b so
T02D1191:312b-2: mtshams mas slong ba'i las dang /
T02D1191:312b-3: sgo mas ye shes kyi 'khor lo dgug pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1191:312b-4: rje btsun zhes byams pa chen po pukka s'i'i glu ste sri zhus bod pa'o //
T02D1191:312b-5: snying rje'i yid kyis bzhengs shig pa ste thig le las bskul ba'o //
T02D1191:312b-6: pukka s'i ni bdag la skyobs ni sems can gyi don mdzod cig pa'o //
T02D1191:312b-7: stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la ni thig le
T02D1191:312b-8: stong pa dang 'dra ste gzhan don mi nus pa'o
T02D1191:312b-9: // bdag la bde chen sbyor ni gzhan don la bskul ba ste gzhan bde bas bdag bde ba'o //
T02D1191:312b-10: khyod med na ni bdag 'gum pas //
T02D1191:312b-11: zhes pa snying rje chen po sha ba r'i'i glu
T02D1191:312b-12: ste bdag gi srog snying rjes gzhan don med na
T02D1191:312b-13: snying rje med pa bdag 'gum pa zhes pa'o //
T02D1191:312b-14: kye'i rdo rje zhes bod pa'o //
T02D1191:312b-16: ri khrod ma 'bras bsgrub pa ni gzhan don mdzod cing pa'o //
T02D1191:312b-17: dga' gtso zhes pa ni dang ba'i dga' ba'i glu ste /
T02D1191:312b-18: khyed dang po sems bskyed tsam na sems can mgron
T02D1191:312b-19: du bos nas da stong pa la ci'i phyir bzhugs
T02D1191:312b-20: zhes bya'o // 'o na rang gis gzhan don byas mod ce na /
T02D1191:312b-21: khyod med na ni phyogs mi khums //
T02D1191:312b-22: zhes pa ste bdag gi don mi shes par dgongs pa'o //
T02D1191:312b-23: de'i phyir bdag zhu bar bgyid pa'o //
T02D1191:312b-24: mig 'phrul lta bur zhes bya ba shlo ka gcig sbyar te /
T02D1191:312b-25: btang snyoms g-yung mo'i glu ste /
T02D1191:312b-26: khyed sprul pa lta bu sgyu ma lta bu mnga' ba ste de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D1191:312b-27: bdag gis khyed kyi thugs 'tshal zhes pa'o //
T02D1191:312b-28: de'i 'thad pa g-yung mo bdag nyid dran nyams ni grong khyer chen po'i mi zhes bya ste /
T02D1191:312b-29: snying rje rgyun chad ma mdzad ni thig le spongs zhes bya'o /
T02D1191:312b-31: aam dang h'um gis rdo rje che /
T02D1191:312b-32: zhes bya ba shlo ka gcig sbyar te 'bras bu
T02D1191:312b-33: he ru kar bzhengs pa ni rdzus skyes dang mthun
T02D1191:312b-34: pa / yud tsam gyis mngon par byang chub pa bskyed de /
T02D1191:312b-35: bdag po sa bon dag gis ni tshig gnyis sbyar te /
T02D1191:312b-36: thig le de cha gnyis las 'og zla ba me
T02D1191:312b-37: long lta bu steng nyi ma mnyam pa nyid de
T02D1191:312b-38: / bar du yi ge aam dang h'um las rdo rje chen po ste /
T02D1191:312b-39: gri gug de las sa bon gyis mtshan ma ni
T02D1191:312b-40: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes de las spro ba
T02D1191:313a-1: nas zhu ba ni bya ba nan tan no //
T02D1191:313a-2: de las skur bzhengs pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //
T02D1191:313a-3: de'i mod la zhabs rnams sa la brdabs pa la sogs par gyur to //
T02D1191:313a-4: 'dir thig le gnyis byas la yum yang 'gran thub
T02D1191:313a-5: tu bskyed de bdag med ma gtso bo yin pa'i
T02D1191:313a-6: phyir ro // zhal brgyad pa la zhabs bzhi zhes sbyar te rnam dag phal cher sngar bshad do //
T02D1191:313a-7: sna tshogs rdo rje ni mi bskyod pa'i rigs mtshon pa'o //
T02D1191:313a-8: thal bas lus la byugs pa ni drug pa rdo rje 'chang gi dag pa'o //
T02D1191:313a-9: dba' rlabs med pa'i bde ba zhes pa lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo'o //
T02D1191:313a-10: de'i rjes la glang po rta bong zhes sbyar te /
T02D1191:313a-11: glo dang dbugs dang de bzhin smyo //
T02D1191:313a-12: khrag skyug mdze dang birdzi ka //
T02D1191:313a-13: mcher pa mchin par rang gzugs ni //
T02D1191:313a-14: go rims bzhin du spong phyir ro //
T02D1191:313a-15: phra ba yang ba mchong par bstan //
T02D1191:313a-16: bdag por gyur par bdag ldan pa //
T02D1191:313a-17: gang yang phyin cing 'dod dgur ldan //
T02D1191:313a-18: dga' mgur spyod pa bde bas so //
T02D1191:313a-20: 'gro ba rnams kyi nang na ni //
T02D1191:313a-21: mi rnams kyi ni 'gro ba mchog / de rnams nad ni zhi don du //
T02D1191:313a-22: glang po la sogs 'dzin pa ni //
T02D1191:313a-23: nyid kyi sku la zlog par mdzad //
T02D1191:313a-25: sgeg cing dpa' ba mi sdug pa //
T02D1191:313a-26: rgod cing drag shul 'jigs su rung //
T02D1191:313a-27: snying rje rngam dang zhi ba yi //
T02D1191:313a-28: gar dgu'i ro dang ldan pa nyid /
T02D1191:313a-30: rig ma la 'khyud bdud bzhi mnan //
T02D1191:313a-31: smin ma bcu ma bzhing zhal gdangs pa //
T02D1191:313a-32: thod pa'i ngo shal mche ba gtsigs //
T02D1191:313a-33: sprul pa 'phro zhing thod khrag gang ;
T02D1191:313a-34: / brgyad po rim par sbyar byas la //
T02D1191:313a-35: zhi ba spyir ni sems can don //
T02D1191:313a-37: dkar mo g-yas na gri gug ste //
T02D1191:313a-38: zhes pa la sogs pa sbyar ro //
T02D1191:313a-39: sngar 'khor bskyed kyang gtso bo ma bstan pas ma bshad la /
T02D1191:313a-40: 'dir gtso bo bstan pas de'i rjes su 'khor bstan par dgongs so //
T02D1191:313a-41: g-yas pa thabs kyi nyon mongs 'joms la /
T02D1191:313a-42: g-yon pa shes rab kyi chos 'chad pa la sogs kun la sbyor ro //
T02D1191:313a-43: de'i rjes su ma mo'i 'khor lo grong nyams dga' zhes pa shlo ka gcig sbyar te /
T02D1191:313a-44: sems dpa' sum brtsegs bsgoms te /
T02D1191:313b-0: thams cad @313b rdo rje 'di yis ni //
T02D1191:313b-1: rang sngags yi ge rdzogs pa dang //
T02D1191:313b-2: sa bon phyag mtshan gyur pa las //
T02D1191:313b-3: sku rang 'dra ba sgom par byed //
T02D1191:313b-4: de yi thugs ka'i sa bon las //
T02D1191:313b-5: lha dgu'i rnam par spyan drangs te //
T02D1191:313b-6: phyag mtshan rdo rje h'um gis mtshan //
T02D1191:313b-7: rjes kyi ye shes ting nge 'dzin sems //
T02D1191:313b-8: lha rnams kun la bsgom par bya //
T02D1191:313b-9: de nas rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D1191:313b-10: ye shes 'khor lo dgug pa ste //
T02D1191:313b-11: dam tshig 'khor lo la mnyam thim //
T02D1191:313b-13: rang gi ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' la 'od zer 'phros te /
T02D1191:313b-14: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad lha dgu'i rnam par spyan drangs te /
T02D1191:313b-15: gzhal yas khang gi phyi rol du byon pa la /
T02D1191:313b-16: rang gi snying ga nas goo r'i la sogs pa
T02D1191:313b-17: spros te aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza
T02D1191:313b-18: zhes mchod pa byas la goo r'i la sogs pa
T02D1191:313b-19: bzhis dgug pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D1191:313b-20: de nas ma brtas pa brtas par byed pa skye mched byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D1191:313b-21: sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa sngar dang mthun par bya'o //
T02D1191:313b-22: de nas dbang bskur ba ste snga ma bzhin spyan
T02D1191:313b-23: drangs pa la yang mchod pa snga ma ltar bya'o
T02D1191:313b-24: // de nas gsol ba gdab pa aom sarba ta
T02D1191:313b-25: th'a ta aa bhi shinytsa tu m'am zhes brjod la
T02D1191:313b-26: le'u gsum pa bzhin dbang bskur bar bsam /
T02D1191:313b-27: gong gi rang gi rigs kyis dbu brgyan no //
T02D1191:313b-28: de nas dbang bskur ba'i sngags brjod par bya'o /
T02D1191:313b-29: de nas rang gi thugs ka nas goo r'i byang
T02D1191:313b-30: chub kyi sems 'dzin pa la sogs pa spros te
T02D1191:313b-31: / lha mo bcu drug gis bdag dang dkyil 'khor
T02D1191:313b-32: gyi lha rnams mchong nas mchod pa'i sngags kyang brjod
T02D1191:313b-33: / do // bstod pa las 'byung ba rnams brjod la //
T02D1191:313b-34: bstod pa'i sngags kyang brjod do //
T02D1191:313b-35: bdud rtsi myang ba yang bya ste //
T02D1191:313b-36: yam las rlung dang ram las me //
T02D1191:313b-37: kam las thod pa rnam gsum bskyed //
T02D1191:313b-38: aa las thos pa chen po ste //
T02D1191:313b-39: nyi zla kha sbyor nang du ni //
T02D1191:313b-40: sa bon ming ni yi ge las //
T02D1191:313b-41: bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga bsam //
T02D1191:313b-42: de steng h'um las rdo rje ni //
T02D1191:313b-43: kha bcang rgya gram h'um gyis mtshan //
T02D1191:313b-44: snying ga'i h'um las 'od zer spros //
T02D1191:313b-45: rgya gram h'um gyis ba dan bskyod //
T02D1191:313b-46: me sbar rdzas rnams zhu ba las //
T02D1191:313b-47: aom las 'od byung ye shes kyi //
T02D1191:314a-0: @314a * // bdud rtsi bkug nas rdo rje zhu //
T02D1191:314a-1: de nyid gsum gyis byin gyis brlab //
T02D1191:314a-2: dkyil 'khor ba yi lha rnams kyi //
T02D1191:314a-3: ljags la rdo rje nas 'bru tsam //
T02D1191:314a-4: bsams te so sor rang sngags kyis //
T02D1191:314a-5: brjod pas bdud rtsis tshim par bsam //
T02D1191:314a-6: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa mri ta su satv'a n'am badzra bh'a ba a'atma konya ham //
T02D1191:314a-7: de nas nag po rab tu bsgom //
T02D1191:314a-8: zhes bya ba la sogs pa kha dog yan lag drug gi rnal 'byor dang /
T02D1191:314a-9: phra mo'i rnal 'byor le'u brgyad pa ltar bsgoms la /
T02D1191:314a-10: rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni phyag rgya chen po'i gdams
T02D1191:314a-11: ngag gam aa ba dh'u t'i rnam gsum gyi man
T02D1191:314a-12: ngag gam / gtum mo la sogs pa gang yang
T02D1191:314a-13: rung ba cig bsgoms la dag pa rjes su dran
T02D1191:314a-14: pa dang sngags bzlas pa dang 'og nas 'byung ba'i
T02D1191:314a-15: gtor ma yang gtang par bya ste /
T02D1191:314a-16: thun bzhi'i rim pas bsgom par bya'o /
T02D1191:314a-17: de la rtags la sogs pa sbyar ba dang spyod pa'i rim pa sngar bstan pa bzhin du bya'o //
T02D1191:314a-18: de ni de la sngags bstan pa ni /
T02D1191:314a-19: bo la gzhib par mdzad nas ni //
T02D1191:314a-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ngo mi tshogs pas
T02D1191:314a-21: khyed la bshad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni
T02D1191:314a-22: phan yon dang bcas pa'i sngags brjod par zhal gyis
T02D1191:314a-23: bzhes pa'o // 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrug pa yin //
T02D1191:314a-24: dkyil 'khor rab tu bzhengs nas ni //
T02D1191:314a-25: zhes bya ba zla ba lta bu'i bsam gtan dang /
T02D1191:314a-26: chu zla lta bu'i dkyil 'khor ba bsgoms la /
T02D1191:314a-27: sgra ring ba dang bzang ba yis //
T02D1191:314a-28: zhes pa ni sgra brnyan dang brag ca lta bu'i bzlas pa ste /
T02D1191:314a-29: bzlas pa 'bum gyis rnal 'byor bdag / ces pa ni bsnyen pa'i grangs so //
T02D1191:314a-30: bzlas pa khri yis gsal ba dang //
T02D1191:314a-31: zhes pa ni sgrub pa'i grangs so //
T02D1191:314a-32: rig byed rnams kyi dang po sbyin //
T02D1191:314a-33: zhes pa ni sngags btu ba ste rig byed ni bzhi ste mchod sbyin gyi rig byed dang //
T02D1191:314a-34: snyan dang gas kyi rig byed dang /
T02D1191:314a-35: srid srung gi rig byed dang /
T02D1191:314a-36: nges brjod kyi rig byed de /
T02D1191:314a-37: de nas aom las 'dren pa ste /
T02D1191:314a-38: zla phyed thig les rnam par brgyan pa ni aom /
T02D1191:314a-39: de nas ni sngags ril por btus pa ste /
T02D1191:314b-0: 'dir dgongs @314b pa ni gtso bo dang 'khor gyi grangs ni sngar bstan zin no //
T02D1191:314b-1: gtso bo'i bzlas pa la zhi ba dang khro bo'i ste /
T02D1191:314b-2: zhi ba'i sngags kyi le'ur bshad zin no //
T02D1191:314b-4: 'bras bu he ru ka'i nga rgyal gyis bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D1191:314b-5: sngags kyi 'bras bu'i don ni gzhan du shes par bya'o //
T02D1191:314b-6: de nas lha mo de dgyes nas zhes pa la sogs pa sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor zhus pa'o //
T02D1191:314b-7: de la ston pa zhes pa nas /
T02D1191:314b-8: nyid kyi dkyil 'khor bri bar mdzad //
T02D1191:314b-9: ces pa ni sngon 'byung dang rjes 'jug rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D1191:314b-10: sngon 'byung du khro chags rnam pa gnyis dang ldan
T02D1191:314b-11: pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen pos dkyil 'khor bri ba
T02D1191:314b-12: bstan to // rjes su 'jug pa ni nyid kyi zhes pas gang zag bzhi'i rim pa ston te /
T02D1191:314b-13: thos bsam gyi mthar phyin pa'i rtags ma thob kyi
T02D1191:314b-14: bar du las dang po pa'i gang zag yin te
T02D1191:314b-15: / rang nyid kyis dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i las thams cad bya'o //
T02D1191:314b-16: gnyis pa gsum pa phab ste bri //
T02D1191:314b-17: zhes pa cung zad ye shes la dbang ba ni dbang po sprin dang 'dra ba'i rtags dang /
T02D1191:314b-18: mngon par shes pa gcig tsam thob pa dang /
T02D1191:314b-19: gsum pa ye shes la dbang ba'i rtags ni du ba dang /
T02D1191:314b-20: srin bu me khyer dang mngon par shes pa gsum tsam thob pa dang /
T02D1191:314b-21: khye'u dang bu mo gzhon nu ma las ye shes phab ste 'dri ru gzhug go //
T02D1191:314b-22: yang dag pa'i ye shes la dbang ba'i rtags ni nam mkha' lta bu mthong ba dang /
T02D1191:314b-23: mngon par shes pa lnga thob pas dkyil 'khor sprul
T02D1191:314b-24: la dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D1191:314b-25: // de'i don ni 'di yin te sngar bstan pas bsnyen pa rdzogs nas /
T02D1191:314b-26: de nas sgrub pa ni sa'i cho ga dang sta gon gyi cho ga dang dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D1191:314b-27: de la sa'i cho ga ni le'u bcu pa nas bshad pa bzhin du byas la /
T02D1191:314b-28: sta gon du gnas pa dang bum pa dang slob
T02D1191:314b-29: ma sta gon ni brtag pa phyi ma'i le'u dang
T02D1191:314b-31: bum pa sta gon nam grangs ni rgyas par bsdun bcu'am drug ste /
T02D1191:314b-33: lha mo brgyad kyi bum pa dang /
T02D1191:314b-34: las thams cad pa dang bcu'o //
T02D1191:314b-35: yang na rnam rgyal gtso bo'i bum pa dang lha mo brgyad po rigs bzhi ru bsdus la lnga //
T02D1191:314b-36: las thams cad pa dang drug go //
T02D1191:315a-0: gang ba'i bum pa ni ci rigs par shes par @315a * //
T02D1191:315a-2: lha so so'i mtshan mas mtshan la rin po che'i bum pa'am gzhal yas khang du bskyed /
T02D1191:315a-3: pam las padma 'dab brgyad bskyed la /
T02D1191:315a-4: rnam par rgyal ba'i bum par sa bon tsam las lha tshang bar bskyed /
T02D1191:315a-5: ye shes pa spyan drangs la mchod bstod bzlas pa byas la lha zhu bar bsam mo //
T02D1191:315a-6: gzhan dag la lha re re'am /
T02D1191:315a-7: lha gnyis gnyis bskyed la cho ga snga ma bzhin bya'o //
T02D1191:315a-8: de nas slob ma'i sta gon ni khrus byas te kun gyis mandala phul la /
T02D1191:315a-9: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas //
T02D1191:315a-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsol ba gdab pa dang /
T02D1191:315a-11: bu tshur theg pa chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pas spro ba bskyed la /
T02D1191:315a-12: bdun rnam par dag pas sbyang ba bya /
T02D1191:315a-14: thub pa nyi ma ma lus pa //
T02D1191:315a-15: zhes bya bas sdom pa la gsol ba gdab /
T02D1191:315a-16: rtog pa rnams ni legs par bsdus nas ni //
T02D1191:315a-17: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni sdom pa bshad /
T02D1191:315a-19: de nas sems bskyed pa gsang ba sta gon la gnas te mchod par bya'o //
T02D1191:315a-20: de nas so shing dor ba'i cho ga bya /
T02D1191:315a-22: ku sha sbyin srung skud gang gsal zab cing rgya che ba'i chos bshad par bya'o //
T02D1191:315a-23: de nas 'byor na sbyin sreg gis lhag par gnas par yang bya'o //
T02D1191:315a-24: rmi lam ma brjed par bsgos la nyal khang du gtang /
T02D1191:315a-25: de dag gi cho gar bya ba ni mtsho skyes
T02D1191:315a-26: kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ltar shes par bya'o
T02D1191:315a-27: // de nas nang bar sdang langs la rmi lam brtag / mchod bstod bya ste /
T02D1191:315a-28: sta gon gyi dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la bheg la
T02D1191:315a-29: nyi zla kha sbyar du bcug / dbyangs yig gis
T02D1191:315a-31: thig dang tshon ni le'u bcu pa ltar shes par bya'o //
T02D1191:315a-32: dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa ni /
T02D1191:315a-33: 'phar ma gcig dang sgo bzhi pa //
T02D1191:315a-35: brgyad pa ze ba bcas par bri //
T02D1191:315a-36: zhes bya ba'i bar du dkyil 'khor gyi rnam dag sngar bzhin shes par bya'o //
T02D1191:315a-37: de nas mtshan ma tsa kli dgod pa ni /
T02D1191:315a-38: snying por bskyed pa'i thod pa nyid //
T02D1191:315a-39: mdog dkar cha ni gsum pa bri //
T02D1191:315a-40: de'i rjes su dbus su thod pa dkar po yang tshig gnyis sbyar ro /
T02D1191:315a-42: dbang ldan du ni sha ra bha //
T02D1191:315a-44: phyag mtshan brgyad du rab tu grags //
T02D1191:315b-0: @315b zhes pa ste rang rang gi sngags la de
T02D1191:315b-1: nyid gsum spel zhing lha ru mos pa dgod par
T02D1191:315b-2: bya'o // de nas bum pa dgod pa ni de
T02D1191:315b-3: nas rnam rgyal nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1191:315b-4: bum pa'i yo byad thams cad gsos gdab ste /
T02D1191:315b-5: sta gon gyi gnas nas rol mo dang bcas pas
T02D1191:315b-6: spyan drangs la rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa ni
T02D1191:315b-7: gtso bo'i spyan sngar gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1191:315b-8: bum pa gzhan rnams ni rang rang gi gnas la nye bar gzhag go //
T02D1191:315b-9: las thams cad pa'i bum pa ni sgo'i g-yas phyogs su dgod par bya'o //
T02D1191:315b-10: de bzhin du mchod pa thams cad kyang nye bar bsham /
T02D1191:315b-11: bla re dang rgyan dang gdugs dang bdan la sogs pa dang rta babs dang rol mo dang /
T02D1191:315b-12: na bza'i bye brag thams cad kyang lha rnams la ras zung re re dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1191:315b-13: de nas dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa ni //
T02D1191:315b-14: mang du brjod pas ci zhig bya //
T02D1191:315b-15: ji ltar de nyid bsdus pa yi //
T02D1191:315b-16: dkyil 'khor cho ga de bzhin bya //
T02D1191:315b-17: zhes bya ba ni spyir de dag thams cad mthun par shes par bya'o //
T02D1191:315b-18: khyad par ni dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgo ru stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
T02D1191:315b-19: yan lag drug gi rnal 'byor pa sbyor ba rnam
T02D1191:315b-20: pa gsum bzlas pa'i bar du bya ba ni bdag
T02D1191:315b-21: nyid ldan pa phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02D1191:315b-22: der dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams sa bon phyag mtshan
T02D1191:315b-23: tsam las bskyed la ye shes kyi 'khor lo dgug
T02D1191:315b-24: / skyed mched dang sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab
T02D1191:315b-26: bdud rtsi myang ba bzlas pa'i bar du bya'o //
T02D1191:315b-27: de nas slob mas mandala byas la gsol ba gdab
T02D1191:315b-28: pa dang cho ga rnams ni sta gon gyi skabs
T02D1191:315b-29: bzhin 'dir bya'o // de dag thun mor gyi cho
T02D1191:315b-30: ga thams cad ni ji ltar de nyid bsdus pa
T02D1191:315b-31: bzhin 'dir bya'o // ltar bya'o // khyad par gyi
T02D1191:315b-32: cho ga ni le'u bcu par bstan pa bzhin no
T02D1191:315b-33: bzhin 'dir bya'o // ltar bya'o // // 'jug pa'i cho ga la dam tshig bsgrags /
T02D1191:315b-35: de nas ye shes dbab pa dang /
T02D1191:315b-37: dkyil 'khor gyi lha ngo bstan nas dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1191:315b-38: de kho na nyid dang lha'i de kho na nyid
T02D1191:315b-39: bcas pa ni 'jug pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1191:315b-40: de nas dbang bskur ba la khyad par du yi dam gyi lha'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D1191:315b-41: bum pa'i dbang bskur ba nas brtsams nas rjes su gnang ba thun mong dang khyad par dang /
T02D1191:315b-42: dbugs dbyung ba dang lung bstan pa rnams mthun par bya ba yin no //
T02D1191:316a-0: de nas khyad par gyi dban @316a * //
T02D1191:316a-1: bskur ba ni gsang ba'i dbang sngon du song bas
T02D1191:316a-2: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba la gnyis
T02D1191:316a-3: te chags can gyi dbang bskur ba dang chags bral
T02D1191:316a-6: bcu gnyis brgyad gnyis lon pa yi //
T02D1191:316a-7: rig ma bde chen brgyad po nyid //
T02D1191:316a-8: ces bya bya ba la sogs pa ni na tshod kyi yon tan dang /
T02D1191:316a-10: sbyangs pa'i yon tan la sogs pa ni snga ma dang 'dra bar gzhug go //
T02D1191:316a-11: ma dang sring mo nyid dang zhes bya ba la
T02D1191:316a-12: sogs pa ni sgra ji bzhin ma yin pa ste
T02D1191:316a-13: slob dpon gyi dbang nor pa dang /
T02D1191:316a-14: rang dang lhan cig dbang mnos pa dang /
T02D1191:316a-15: rang gis bum pa'i dbang bskur ba byas pa dang /
T02D1191:316a-16: de la sogs pa chos kyis bsdus pa yin no //
T02D1191:316a-19: de la rtsed mo rtse bar bya //
T02D1191:316a-20: zhes bya ba'i bar du ni thun tshod dang po'o //
T02D1191:316a-21: de nas thun tshod gnyis pa la //
T02D1191:316a-23: slob dpon la sogs rab phye nas //
T02D1191:316a-24: zhes bya ba'i bar ni bya ba'i rim pa ste
T02D1191:316a-25: mchod pa dang bstod pa dang gsol ba gdab pa
T02D1191:316a-27: de nas dbang bskur ba dngos ni de nyid la bstan par bya /
T02D1191:316a-28: dga' bral dang po mchog mtha' can //
T02D1191:316a-29: thams cad rgyud du spros pa ste //
T02D1191:316a-30: mtha' yis mtha' yi phye ba nyid //
T02D1191:316a-31: ces bya ba ni rgyud kyi rim pa dang sbyar
T02D1191:316a-32: te bya ba'i rgyud dang spyod pa'i rgyud dang rnal
T02D1191:316a-33: 'byor rgyud dang / rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud de /
T02D1191:316a-34: dang po ru blta ba tsam gyis dga' ba'i ye shes sbas te bstan pa'o //
T02D1191:316a-35: gnyis pa ru lha rnams phan tshun dgod pa tsam gyis mchog dga'i ye shes sbas te bstan pa'o //
T02D1191:316a-36: gsum par ni lha dam tshig sems dpa' dang //
T02D1191:316a-37: ye shes sems dpa' phyag rgya 'khyud pa tsam gyis dga' bral gyi ye shes sbas te bstan to //
T02D1191:316a-38: 'dir ni kun du ru'i lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes gtan la phab ste bstan to //
T02D1191:316a-39: yang dang po dga' ba lam nas zhugs pa yin no //
T02D1191:316a-40: gnyis pa mchog dga' gnyen po dang ldan pa yin no //
T02D1191:316a-41: gsum pa dga' bral gnyen por gyur pa ste mi mthun pa dang bral ba yin no //
T02D1191:316a-42: bzhi pa lhan cig skyes pa ste /
T02D1191:316a-43: gnyen po 'ba' zhig gi ngo bo yin no //
T02D1191:316a-44: de nas chags bral gyi dbang bskur ba bstan pa ni /
T02D1191:316a-45: rdo rje mchod pas yang sbyar nas //
T02D1191:316a-46: lha de zhes bya ba la sogs pa zhus pa'o //
T02D1191:316b-0: bcom ldan 'das @316b bka' stsal zhes bya ba ni lan te /
T02D1191:316b-1: der ni thog ma tha ma med //
T02D1191:316b-2: srid med mya ngan 'das pa med //
T02D1191:316b-3: 'di ni mchog tu bde chen nyid //
T02D1191:316b-4: bdag med gzhan yang med pa nyid //
T02D1191:316b-5: ces pa ste 'dis ni bya rog gi mig dang
T02D1191:316b-6: 'dra bar snga ma dang phyi ma gnyis kyi don
T02D1191:316b-8: shes bya'i dbang du byas te bshad pa dang /
T02D1191:316b-9: snga phyi'i don lhan cig skyes par gtan la dbab pa dang /
T02D1191:316b-10: rdzogs pa'i rim pa mngon rtogs cig car ston to //
T02D1191:316b-11: dang po ni thog ma ste dngos po skye bar ma grub //
T02D1191:316b-14: srid med 'khor ba'i dngos po thams cad kyang mi gnas so ;
T02D1191:316b-15: / mya ngan las 'das par yang mi gnas so //
T02D1191:316b-16: bdag dang gzhan med pa ste gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po yang med de /
T02D1191:316b-17: 'dir ni mchog tu bde chen ni 'bras bu'i mtshan
T02D1191:316b-18: nyid de ma bcos pa'i rang byung gi ye shes
T02D1191:316b-23: srid med mya ngan 'das med ni lhan cig skyes
T02D1191:316b-24: pa'i dga' ba ste 'khor ba dang mya ngan las
T02D1191:316b-26: 'di ni mchog tu bde chen nyid ni zag pa med pa'i don gyi ye shes mtshon pa'o //
T02D1191:316b-27: bdag med gzhan med ces bya ba ni bdag gzhan gyi rtog pa 'gags pa'o ;
T02D1191:316b-28: / yang sid med ces pa phyi snod kyi 'jig rten dang /
T02D1191:316b-29: nang bcud kyi sems can thams cad rten dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor du bsdu /
T02D1191:316b-30: mya ngan las 'das pa med ces pa ni /
T02D1191:316b-31: rten dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor he ru ka dang bdag med mar bsdus pa'o //
T02D1191:316b-32: bdag med gzhan med ni bdag med ma yang he ru ka la bsdu ba'o //
T02D1191:316b-33: der thog ma dbus mtha' med ni thugs ka'i zla
T02D1191:316b-34: ba dang nyi ma ni dbus kyi yi ge h'um
T02D1191:316b-35: la bsdu ba'o // h'um yang zhabs kyu la de 'a la 'a yang ha la'o //
T02D1191:316b-37: zla tshes ni thig le la'o //
T02D1191:316b-38: thig le n'a da mar me ltar phra ba'o //
T02D1191:316b-39: 'di ni mchog tu bde chen nyid //
T02D1191:316b-41: lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes spros pa thams cad dang bral ba bsgom pa'o //
T02D1191:316b-42: da ni dbang bskur ba'i thabs bstan pa ni /
T02D1191:316b-43: longs spyod kyi ni rlabs nyid la //
T02D1191:316b-44: rang gi g-yas dang lag gzhan gyi //
T02D1191:316b-45: mthe bong dad ni srin lag gang //
T02D1191:317a-2: / zhes pa la la n'a dang ra sa n'a
T02D1191:317a-3: gnyis rang gi lag pa dang bla ma'i lag pas
T02D1191:317a-4: btsir ba ste / de las dga' ba bzhi rim gyis ye shes skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1191:317a-5: de la ci zhig skye zhe na /
T02D1191:317a-6: gzhon nu'i dga' ba ji lta ba'am /
T02D1191:317a-7: lkugs pa'i rmi lam ji lta ba //
T02D1191:317a-8: zhes bya ste nyams su myong ba brjod du med pa'i dpe'o //
T02D1191:317a-9: ji ltar mtshon du btub ce na /
T02D1191:317a-10: mchog gi mtha' dang dga' bral dbus //
T02D1191:317a-11: stong dang stong min he ru ka //
T02D1191:317a-12: zhes pa ste mchog gi mtha' ni mchog dga' ba'o //
T02D1191:317a-13: dga' bral dbus ni dga' bral yang yin la dbus yin te mchog dga'i rjes la bya zhes bya'o //
T02D1191:317a-14: tha ma ni lhan cig skyes pa ste /
T02D1191:317a-15: de'i don stong pa dang zhes pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum mo //
T02D1191:317a-16: stong min ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes te dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1191:317a-17: kha cig ni dga' bral dbus zhes bya ba ni dga' bral tha mar te /
T02D1191:317a-18: gsum par lhan cig skyes pa yin zhes zer ro //
T02D1191:317a-19: 'di la brtag pa mang du yod mod kyang spros pa mang du dogs pas ma byas so //
T02D1191:317a-20: dbang de rnams bskur ba'i thabs ni bla ma las shes par bya'o //
T02D1191:317a-23: // / da ni bris sku dang glegs bam la sogs
T02D1191:317a-24: pa'i mtshan nyid ji ltar bya ba dang cho ga
T02D1191:317a-25: ji ltar bya ba dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo sngar
T02D1191:317a-26: 'du ba la sogs pa'i gnas bstan kyang mngon par
T02D1191:317a-27: rtogs pa ma bstan pas le'u gnyis gsungs so //
T02D1191:317a-28: lha mo la ni dam 'khyud cing //
T02D1191:317a-30: mnyam sbyar bde ba myong mdzad nas //
T02D1191:317a-31: zhes pa'i bar gyis gtso bo chags pa dang khro bo'i tshul gyis gsungs pa'o ;
T02D1191:317a-32: / phyag rgya lnga ni rab phye zhes pa nas //
T02D1191:317a-33: sangs rgyas lnga yi phyag rgyas gdab //
T02D1191:317a-34: ces pa'i bar ni dgongs pa dang /
T02D1191:317a-35: phyag rgya lnga'i rnam dag go sla ba dang sngar bshad do //
T02D1191:317a-36: de nas rab tu bzhad mdzad cing //
T02D1191:317a-37: bya ba nas byed pa bde ba chen po gsungs
T02D1191:317a-38: kyi bar gyis bris sku'i bya ba dang cho ga
T02D1191:317a-39: zhus pa'o ; / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal zhes pa nas /
T02D1191:317a-41: zhes pa la sogs pas sgrub pa po dang ri
T02D1191:317a-42: mo mkhan dang ras yug 'khal ba dang thag pa'i
T02D1191:317a-43: bar kyang dam tshig can gyis bya'o //
T02D1191:317a-44: dben pa'i gnas su tshon kong dang pir la sogs te /
T02D1191:317b-0: @317b mchod pa dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo ci 'byor pa bya'o //
T02D1191:317b-1: de nas de la lha mos zhus //
T02D1191:317b-2: zhes pa la sogs pa le'u bdun pa sbyar te /
T02D1191:317b-3: glegs bam ji lta ji ltar bya ba snga ma dang 'dra ste go sla'o //
T02D1191:317b-4: bha gar ling ga rab gnas zhes bya ba nas
T02D1191:317b-5: sgrub pa can gyi dngos grub 'gyur gyi bar gyis
T02D1191:317b-6: tshogs kyi dgos pa bstan to //
T02D1191:317b-7: le'u gnyis gcig tu bskor te mngon rtogs su shes par byed pa'i tshe /
T02D1191:317b-8: tshogs kyi 'khor lor 'dod pa dang la la dag spros bcas kyi spyod par yang bzhed do //
T02D1191:317b-9: de la tshogs kyi 'khor lo ni bzhi ste /
T02D1191:317b-14: de la phan yon ni ston mo bza' ba'am chogs
T02D1191:317b-15: la zhugs pa'i dus su sgrub pa dang ngos grub
T02D1191:317b-16: tu gyur te gdul bya brod pa skye'o //
T02D1191:317b-17: gnas ni dur khrod la sogs pa'o //
T02D1191:317b-18: dus ni zla ba byung ngo cog gi bcu bzhi
T02D1191:317b-19: pa'am mtshan phyed dam bsam pa'i khyad par ldan pa'o
T02D1191:317b-21: thun mong dang khyad par ro //
T02D1191:317b-23: gdan bri ba ni gdan la rab 'bring gsum ste /
T02D1191:317b-26: dur khrod kyi ras te ro ru mos pas bya'o //
T02D1191:317b-27: rgyan dgram pa la yang gsum ste thal chen gyis byug pa dang /
T02D1191:317b-28: zhing dang stag gi pags pa dang ;
T02D1191:317b-30: rnal 'byor pa lha'i tshul du dgod pa'o //
T02D1191:317b-31: thun mong ma yin pa dpa' bo'i ston mo dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo'o //
T02D1191:317b-32: dpa' bo'i ston mo la bzhi ste /
T02D1191:317b-33: sder dgod cing bza' ba'i ston mo gtso bor bstan pa'o //
T02D1191:317b-34: sder la gsum ste rab zhing gi pags pa 'bring dur khrod kyi ras /
T02D1191:317b-35: tha ma shing lo'i sder ro //
T02D1191:317b-36: ji ltar bza' ba'i tshul tshod ma dang bcas pa dang /
T02D1191:317b-38: ltos shig dga' ba yi ni chos //
T02D1191:317b-39: 'di la rnam rtog yod ma yin //
T02D1191:317b-40: bram ze khyi dang gdol pa gsum //
T02D1191:317b-41: rang bzhin gcig las lhan cig bza' //
T02D1191:317b-43: btung ba'i gtso bo su ra ste cung zad tsam dang /
T02D1191:317b-44: ji ltar btung ba'i tshul snod dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1191:317b-45: tshogs la gnyis te las dang po pas yon tan
T02D1191:317b-46: dang ldan pa'i phyag rgyas g-yas su 'dug ste bsgom
T02D1191:318a-0: pa dang / las smin pas bgrod dang bgrod min du mchod pas @318a * //
T02D1191:318a-2: 'di'i don ni mngon par rtogs pa ste dam tshig
T02D1191:318a-3: bsgrub pa dbang bskur ba dang rab tu gnas pa
T02D1191:318a-4: dang / dngos grub bsgrub pa dpa' bo'i ston mo tsam dang ga na tsa kra la brten pa'o //
T02D1191:318a-5: tshogs kyi 'khor lo ni gnas dben bar yo byad rnams tshogs par byas te /
T02D1191:318a-6: rnal 'byor ma rnams dang pa rnams tshogs par byas
T02D1191:318a-7: la dang por bya ba'i rim pa thig gdab pa
T02D1191:318a-9: mchod pa bshams te gdan rnams la rang gi rgyun dang bcas pas lha so sor dgod do //
T02D1191:318a-10: de nas las kyi rdo rje mchod pa nas tshogs dang /
T02D1191:318a-11: tshad med pa dang stong pa nyid dang ra ba
T02D1191:318a-12: dang dra ba dang rten gyi rnal 'byor bsgoms te
T02D1191:318a-13: sbyor ba gsum mam yan lag drug bsgoms la /
T02D1191:318a-14: de nas bla mas dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'i tshul du
T02D1191:318a-15: rnal 'byor pa rnams lhar bskyed pa dang ye shes
T02D1191:318a-17: phyogs mtshams kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams ni rang rang gi lhar mos shing bskyed la /
T02D1191:318a-18: de nas las kyi rdo rjes tshogs brlabs spyan drangs
T02D1191:318a-19: la dbul ba'i rim pa mandala byas la rim bzhin
T02D1191:318a-20: du dbul / tshogs dbul ba la slob dpon gyis byin gyis brlab pa'i glu dang gar bya'o //
T02D1191:318a-21: slob ma rnams rang gi man ngag bsgom mo //
T02D1191:318a-22: de nas ci rigs par bya'o //
T02D1191:318a-23: dbang bskur ram rab gnas byed na dus der bya'o //
T02D1191:318a-24: dngos grub bsgrub pa ni yang dang yang du bya'o //
T02D1191:318a-25: dpa' bo'i ston mo ni lha'i nga rgyal tsam gyis bya'o //
T02D1191:318a-26: ga na tsakra'i ldang tshad kyang shes par bya'o //
T02D1191:318a-27: le'u drug pa dang bdun pa'o /
T02D1191:318a-29: // / de nas rnal 'byor ma zhes bya ba la sogs pas brtags nas /
T02D1191:318a-30: las kyi phyag rgya chen po ji lta bu zhes dris pa dang /
T02D1191:318a-31: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
T02D1191:318a-32: zhes pa la sogs pa lan gsungs te /
T02D1191:318a-33: gang zag bzhi las chags can 'dul ba la dgongs nas lha mo rigs bzhi ste /
T02D1191:318a-34: glang po can dang dung can dang padma can dang
T02D1191:318a-35: ri bong can te 'dir ni padma can bstan to
T02D1191:318a-36: // rdo rje'i rigs dang rin po che'i rigs dang
T02D1191:318a-37: padma'i rigs dang las kyi rigs te go rims bzhin
T02D1191:318a-38: // du sbyar ro // de nas rnal 'byor ma
T02D1191:318a-39: la sogs pas smon lam gdab pa zhus pa dang
T02D1191:318a-40: // du sbyar ro // / bcom ldan 'das kyis
T02D1191:318b-0: bka' stsal @318b pa ni dad pa can 'dul ba
T02D1191:318b-1: // du sbyar ro // / ste / bskyed pa'i
T02D1191:318b-2: rim pa la smon lam gdab pa dang rdzogs pa'i
T02D1191:318b-4: rigs su skye dang zhes bla ma la 'jig rten pa'i rigs btsun pa'am /
T02D1191:318b-5: yang na theg pa chen po'i rigs can du skye ba dang /
T02D1191:318b-6: dam tshig ma nyams pa dang /
T02D1191:318b-7: dgyes pa'i rdo rje phyin ci ma log par ston pa dang /
T02D1191:318b-8: lag pa rdo rje dril bu 'khrol //
T02D1191:318b-9: zab mo'i chos ni klog pa dang //
T02D1191:318b-10: zhes pa ste lus dang ngag dang yid de lha'i rnal 'byor dang /
T02D1191:318b-11: bzlas pa dang bsgom pa de dang ldan pa'i bla ma de 'dra ba dang /
T02D1191:318b-12: skye ba gang du skyes kyang phrad par shog cig pa'o //
T02D1191:318b-13: yang na rang nyid de bzhin skye bar shog ces bya'o //
T02D1191:318b-14: btsun mo zhu ba zhes bya ba ni thig le bsgom pa dang /
T02D1191:318b-15: rdzogs rim de kho na bsgom pa bla ma dang rang yang de dang phrad par shog ces pa'o //
T02D1191:318b-16: lha mo de dgyes nas zhes pa gti mug can 'dul ba'i thabs zhus ba /
T02D1191:318b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa lan te /
T02D1191:318b-18: dang po gso sbyong sbyin pa ni bsnyen gnas nas
T02D1191:318b-19: bzung la dge tshul dang de ci rigs par sbyin
T02D1191:318b-20: no // de rjes bslab pa'i gnas bcu ni mi
T02D1191:318b-21: dge ba'i bcu spang ba byang chub sems dpa'i sdom
T02D1191:318b-22: no // pa sbyin pa'o // de la bye brag
T02D1191:318b-23: smra ba bstan pa ni so sor thar pa dang
T02D1191:318b-24: ldan pa la bye brag tu smra ba'i grub mtha'
T02D1191:318b-25: no // pa sbyin pa'o // bstan te / gzung
T02D1191:318b-26: ba'i yul rdul phra rab dang nang 'dzin pa'i sems
T02D1191:318b-28: mdo sde pa yang de bzhin no //
T02D1191:318b-29: zhes pa dge slong gi sdom pa dang ldan pa
T02D1191:318b-30: la mdo sde pa'i grub mtha' bstan pa'i phyir gzung
T02D1191:318b-31: ba'i yul 'dus par snang zhing nang 'dzin pa'i sems
T02D1191:318b-32: kyang yod de rnam pa dang bcas pa de sbyor
T02D1191:318b-33: ba dang ni bskor ba dang /
T02D1191:318b-34: bar med rnam par gnas kyang rung //
T02D1191:318b-36: de nas rnal 'byor spyod pa bstan //
T02D1191:318b-37: zhes pa byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa dang ldan pa la sems tsam bstan te /
T02D1191:318b-38: rnam bcas dang rnam med de rnams pa sna tshogs pa shes pa gcig tu bden pa'o //
T02D1191:318b-39: rnam med ni brtags te shes pa shel dag pa lta bur snang ba ste /
T02D1191:318b-40: rigs pas 'grub cing rigs pas mi gnod par 'dod pa'o /
T02D1191:318b-41: de'i rjes su dbu ma bstan pa ni sgyu mar smra ba dang rab tu mi gnas pa'o //
T02D1191:319a-0: sgyu mar smra ba ni rnam @319a * //
T02D1191:319a-1: bcad yang dag par bcad nas yongs gcod sgyu mar 'dod /
T02D1191:319a-2: rab tu mi gnas pa ni spros pa'i mtha' bzhi bcad nas khas len yang med pa'o //
T02D1191:319a-3: sngags kyi rim pa kun shes nas ni bya ba
T02D1191:319a-4: dang spyod pa dang rnal 'byor rgyud de phyi rol
T02D1191:319a-6: dgyes pa'i rdo rje mthar thug phyag rgya chen po lhan cig skyes pa bstan pa'o //
T02D1191:319a-8: dang po zhing ni sbyang ba'i phyir //
T02D1191:319a-9: drug cu pa yi kha zas gdab //
T02D1191:319a-10: de nas 'bru rnams rim gyis gdab //
T02D1191:319a-11: phyi nas 'bras dkar sa bon no //
T02D1191:319a-12: bslab tshig lnga ba'i rim pa yis //
T02D1191:319a-13: rgyud ni de ltar sbyang bar bya //
T02D1191:319a-17: // / da ni zhe sdang can gyi gang zag gdul ba'i don du /
T02D1191:319a-18: de nas kha sbyar 'byed pa yi //
T02D1191:319a-19: mtshan nyid yang dag rab tu bshad //
T02D1191:319a-20: ces bya ba shlo ka gcig gis dgos pa bstan to //
T02D1191:319a-21: bstan pa la gnod pa byed pa dang zhes pa tshigs gsum gyis yul gyi gnang ba bstan to //
T02D1191:319a-22: snying rjes gsad par bya ba nyid //
T02D1191:319a-23: ces bya ba ni bsam pas gnang ba'o //
T02D1191:319a-24: bsgrub bya'i rtsa ba la zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni sbyor bar gnang ba'o //
T02D1191:319a-25: sangs rgyas kyang ni nges par 'jig / ces pa
T02D1191:319a-26: ni sangs rgyas kyi bsrung ba yang 'jig ces bya'o
T02D1191:319a-27: // yang na la dor ba'i tshig go //
T02D1191:319a-28: de yi lam du khab ni me //
T02D1191:319a-29: zhes bya ba a sogs pas ni shes pa sbyong ba bstan pa'o /
T02D1191:319a-30: sngags dang bsam gtan tsam gyis gsad par bya'o //
T02D1191:319a-31: sbyin sreg dang 'khor lo dang phyag rgya dang rdzas kyi sbyor ba rnams ni sbyor bas gnang ba'o //
T02D1191:319a-32: man ngag rim pa ni bla ma las shes par bya'o //
T02D1191:319a-33: de'i 'thad pa ni brjod bya nus pa dang ldan
T02D1191:319a-34: pa dang rjod byed nus pa dang ldan pa ste
T02D1191:319a-35: / rtog med dngos grub sbyin pa po //
T02D1191:319a-36: zhes pa tshig dang pos rdzogs pa'i rim pa bstan to //
T02D1191:319a-37: srid pa sbyong ba nyams dga' ba //
T02D1191:319a-38: zhes pa'i tshig gcig gis bskyed pa'i rim pa mdor bstan pa'o //
T02D1191:319a-40: rin chen gzi brjid 'bar ba yi //
T02D1191:319a-41: zhes pa la sogs pa'i dpe dang don gnyis su
T02D1191:319a-42: sbyar te dper na mu tig la sogs pa'i rin
T02D1191:319b-0: po che'i khyad par rnams phug med par @319b gyur
T02D1191:319b-1: na rgyan la sogs par mi btub la phug na
T02D1191:319b-2: rgyan la sogs pa dga' bskyed par byed do //
T02D1191:319b-3: de bzhin du 'dod pa'i yon tan rnam pa lnga
T02D1191:319b-4: thabs de kho na nyid kyis zin na bdud rtsi
T02D1191:319b-6: dngos po la mngon par zhen pas ni dug tu 'gyur ro //
T02D1191:319b-7: 'khor ba'i rnam pa he ru ka //
T02D1191:319b-8: zhes bya ba ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rgyas par bshad pa ste /
T02D1191:319b-9: rnam par dag pa'i don phal cher rnam par dag pa'i le'ur bshad do //
T02D1191:319b-10: phags pa byang chub yan lag bdun ni dran pa
T02D1191:319b-11: dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang brtson 'grus
T02D1191:319b-12: dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms dang shin tu sbyangs
T02D1191:319b-13: pa dang ste / pags pa rim pa bdun gyi tshul du gnas pa dang sbyar ro //
T02D1191:319b-14: rus pa bden pa bzhi po nyid ni tshogs chen
T02D1191:319b-15: po bzhi las sdug bsngal gyi bden pa dang kun
T02D1191:319b-16: 'byung gi bden pa dang 'gog pa'i bden pa dang
T02D1191:319b-18: gzhan dag ni go sla bas ma bshad do //
T02D1191:319b-19: bdag med mas gsol ba sngags bsdu ba ni ji ltar 'gyur //
T02D1191:319b-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rjod byed nus pa dang ldan par ston te /
T02D1191:319b-21: las dang po pas dngos grub sgrub pa ni sngags
T02D1191:319b-22: dag pa las 'byung ste de'i don du sngags btu
T02D1191:319b-23: ba gsungs pa / bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02D1191:319b-32: dbyangs zhes bya ba dang po'i sde tshan zhes bya
T02D1191:319b-33: ba la sogs pa skabs kyis gzhan yang sbyar ro
T02D1191:319b-34: // 'dir yang rnal 'byor ma'i sa bon du sbyar
T02D1191:319b-35: bas ni rim par bstan te rkyen du sbyar ba
T02D1191:319b-36: // dang / yan lag tu shes par bya ste gzhan du yang sbyar ro //
T02D1191:319b-44: ka tshan dang po zhes bya ba dang /
T02D1191:319b-45: gnyis pa sa bon du yang shes par bya /
T02D1191:319b-46: tsa'i sde tshan ni gnyis pa ste yig 'bru lnga lnga'o //
T02D1191:319b-47: ta tha ni gsum pa ste kun la shes so //
T02D1191:319b-48: ta tha ni bzhi pa dang lnga pa gnyis char yang sde tshan ni lnga lngar shes //
T02D1191:319b-49: pa pha ni lnga par shes /
T02D1191:319b-50: ya ra ni mthar gnas zhes bya ba'i 'byung ba bzhi sa bon zhes bya /
T02D1191:319b-51: drug pa'am bdun pa'i sde zhes bya /
T02D1191:319b-52: brgyad pa'i sde pa aushma zhes bya /
T02D1191:319b-53: sde tshan 'di rnams med de yi ge 'di rnams las sngags btu bar bya'o //
T02D1191:320a-0: yi ge 'og ma gsum ni yi @320a * //
T02D1191:320a-2: yi ge'i dbang phyug ces bya /
T02D1191:320a-3: yi ge thu bo zhes bya /
T02D1191:320a-4: rig byed dang po zhes bya /
T02D1191:320a-6: rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ste /
T02D1191:320a-7: gnyis po la yang skabs kyis shes par bya'o //
T02D1191:320a-8: 'dis ni rgyud thams cad kyi sngag btub la 'jug go //
T02D1191:320a-9: 'bru so sor sbyar ba ni go sla'o //
T02D1191:320a-12: // / de nas chos kun sdom gcig pa'o //
T02D1191:320a-13: zhes bya ba la sogs pa spyir bstan pa bzlas
T02D1191:320a-14: pa'i rten bgrang phreng dang bza' ba gnyis ston te
T02D1191:320a-15: / las so so'i phreng ba ni /
T02D1191:320a-16: shel gyis rengs pa'i bzlas pa nyid //
T02D1191:320a-17: ces bya ba la sogs pa go sla'o //
T02D1191:320a-18: rengs pa'i 'o ma btung pa nyid ni chang ngam byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1191:320a-19: dbang la rang gi 'dun pas spyad ni gang 'dod pa'o //
T02D1191:320a-20: bsad pa la ni si hla la nyid ni rang 'byung gi khrag go //
T02D1191:320a-21: dgug pa la ni bzhi mnyam nyid ni dri chen no //
T02D1191:320a-22: sdang la s'a lu skyes par brjod ni sha chen no //
T02D1191:320a-23: bskrad pa nyid la gla ba brjod ni dri chu'o //
T02D1191:320a-24: yang na mtha'i shva dang zhes pa la sogs pa ni rab gnas kyi le'ur bshad do //
T02D1191:320a-25: de dag gis kyang rengs pa la sogs pa'i las go rims bzhin no //
T02D1191:320a-27: gsang sngags sgrub pa lnga bcu ste //
T02D1191:320a-28: dbang gi las la de yi phyed //
T02D1191:320a-29: zhi la brgya phrag gcig yin te //
T02D1191:320a-30: de bzhin rgyas la brgya lhag pa'o //
T02D1191:320a-31: mngon spyod la ni drug cu ste //
T02D1191:320a-32: las gyi khyad par gyis ni sbyar //
T02D1191:320a-33: las kyi bye brag ji bzhin du //
T02D1191:320a-34: bgrang ba'i phreng ba la sogs bya //
T02D1191:320a-35: phyogs dang phyogs mtshams brgyad dang ni //
T02D1191:320a-36: dgug pa dbus kyi sangs rgyas te //
T02D1191:320a-37: skud pa dgu la byin gyis brlab //
T02D1191:320a-38: ri lu rnam ni dgra bcom ste //
T02D1191:320a-39: steng du mchod rten brtag par bya //
T02D1191:320a-40: mchod rten chos kyi dbang po bas //
T02D1191:320a-41: steng du chos kyi dbyings yin no //
T02D1191:320a-42: zhes gsungs pas ni bgrang gi las kyi bye brag bstan no //
T02D1191:320a-46: zhes bya ba la sogs pa khor chags rnam pa
T02D1191:320a-47: gnyis dang ldan pas kun rdzob kyi rnam pa'i skyes
T02D1191:320a-48: pa dang bud med kyi rigs mtshon pa'i rtag gsungs
T02D1191:320a-49: pa / bud med dam ni skyes pa yi //
T02D1191:320a-50: gang gi srin lag rtsa ba na //
T02D1191:320a-51: rdo rje rtse dgu par gyur pa //
T02D1191:320a-52: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rigs kyi mtshan ma dang //
T02D1191:320a-53: rnal 'byor pa gang nag po yin //
T02D1191:320a-54: de yi lha ni mi bskyod pa //
T02D1191:320a-55: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni kha dog gi mtshan ma dang /
T02D1191:320b-0: mchod pa'i rten @320b dang chos 'byung la sogs pas de rnams mtshon te /
T02D1191:320b-1: rgyud 'dir ni gnyis mtshon gzhan du ni gzhan dag kyang bshad do //
T02D1191:320b-3: gang zhig smin ma g-yo byed cing //
T02D1191:320b-4: kun du chags pas blta ba dang //
T02D1191:320b-5: sngon gyi gzugs ni bsdus nas su //
T02D1191:320b-6: shi nas 'jog par byed pa dag / gzugs can mar ni shes bya ste //
T02D1191:320b-7: dpa' bo gnyis med par bsten bya //
T02D1191:320b-10: dmar zhing ser ba'i bud med gang //
T02D1191:320b-11: padma'i 'dab ltar dkyus ring mig / rtag tu gos dkar la dga' zhing //
T02D1191:320b-12: tsandan sar pa'i pa'i dri dang ldan //
T02D1191:320b-13: bde gshegs 'dus pa nyid la dga' //
T02D1191:320b-14: zhes par lta ba'i rjes su 'gro //
T02D1191:320b-15: khyim du padma bri bar byed //
T02D1191:320b-18: 'dis ni sems can gyi dus na de dang de'i
T02D1191:320b-19: rigs su shes pas rang rgyal mi bcad pa dang
T02D1191:320b-20: / gzhan la mtho mi btsam pa dang brnyas par mi bya ba'o //
T02D1191:320b-21: sangs rgyas pa'i dus su rigs de ru sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro //
T02D1191:320b-22: bha ga ling gar 'o mdzad nas //
T02D1191:320b-23: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni lus kyi 'khrul 'khor bstan te bla ma las shes par bya'o //
T02D1191:320b-24: le'u 'dis ni spyod pa dang shes rab ye shes kyi dbang dang /
T02D1191:320b-25: las kyi phyag rgya la brten te bsgom pa'i yan lag bstan to //
T02D1191:320b-28: // / de nas rdo rje can gyi dbang bzhi'i don
T02D1191:320b-29: ni bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1191:320b-30: le'u tha ma 'dir dbang bzhi'i tshigs su bcad pa
T02D1191:320b-31: dang // rdo rje dang padma byin gyis brlab pa ston to //
T02D1191:320b-32: rdo rje rab gnas rdo rje nyid //
T02D1191:320b-33: che dang chen po dril bu zung //
T02D1191:320b-34: zhes bya ba ni bum pa'i dbang nas brtsams te //
T02D1191:320b-35: brtul zhugs kyi dbang khyad par rdo rje slob dpon gyi brtul zhugs bstan to //
T02D1191:320b-36: di ring rdo rje slob dpon gyur //
T02D1191:320b-37: slob ma bsdu pa nyid du gyis //
T02D1191:320b-38: zhes pa ni lung bstan pa dang rjes su gnang ba dang /
T02D1191:320b-39: dbugs dbyung ba dang slob dpon gyi las la sogs pa thams cad bstan no //
T02D1191:320b-40: ji ltar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis //
T02D1191:320b-41: byang chub sras rnams dbang bskur ba //
T02D1191:320b-42: bdag gi gsang ba'i dbang gis ni //
T02D1191:320b-43: sems kyi rgyun gyi dbang bskur to //
T02D1191:320b-44: zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems sbyin pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
T02D1191:320b-45: lha mo dga' byin gnas sbyin ma //
T02D1191:320b-46: zhes bya ba shlo ka gcig gis ni rig ma sbyin pa'o //
T02D1191:320b-47: ye shes 'di ni ches phra zhing //
T02D1191:321a-0: zhes pa ni gsum pas go phye ba'i bzhi pa'i @321a don te ;
T02D1191:321a-1: / rdo rje nam mkha'i dkyil lta bu ni rtog pas stong pa'i dpes bstan to //
T02D1191:321a-2: rdul bral thar pa zhi ba nyid ni nyon mongs pa dang glo bur ba thams cad zhi ba'o //
T02D1191:321a-3: khyod rang yang ni de yi pha /
T02D1191:321a-4: zhes pa ni rang gi sems te de'i bde ba lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1191:321a-5: da ni rdo rje dang padma byin gyis brlab ste /
T02D1191:321a-6: aom padma su kha dha ra la sogs pas bstan
T02D1191:321a-7: te rdo rje 'chang bskyed pa'i rjes la 'khor bskyed
T02D1191:321a-8: pa'i don du byin gyis brlab pa dang tha mal
T02D1191:321a-10: yang spyod pa dang las kyi phyag rgya bsgom pa'i sngon du yang 'gro ba'o //
T02D1191:321a-11: spyi bor aom gyi rnam pa /
T02D1191:321a-12: snying gar h'um gyi rnam pa /
T02D1191:321a-13: ze'u 'bru la ni aa'i rnam pa'o zhes bya ba
T02D1191:321a-14: ni sku gsung thugs kyi byin gyis brlab pa'i sa
T02D1191:321a-15: bon no // gang ze'u 'bru ni sa'i rnam pa'o /
T02D1191:321a-16: zhes pa rdo rje padma byin gyis rlob pa yang gzung ste /
T02D1191:321a-18: aom gyis nor bu phat gyis bug sgo dgag /
T02D1191:321a-19: aom gyis padma aas ze'u 'bru phat kyis bug sgo dgag pa'o //
T02D1191:321a-21: h'um phat rnam pa 'dod mi bya //
T02D1191:321a-22: zhes gsungs pa ni bdag med ma la bkag pa'o //
T02D1191:321a-23: dgyes pa'i rdo rje la ni 'dod pa kho na'o /
T02D1191:321a-25: // / rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu ma'i brtag
T02D1191:321a-26: pa zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po ste
T02D1191:321a-27: sgyu ma chen po zhes bya'o //
T02D1191:321a-28: brtag pa ni cho ga zhi ba mo'o //
T02D1191:321a-29: brtag pa sum cu rtsa gnyis la /
T02D1191:321a-30: phyung ba zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod dgyes pa'i rdo rje la bsdu bya brtag pa sum cu //
T02D1191:321a-31: sdud byed gnyis te de yang bsdu bya sdud byed du byas pa sum cu rtsa gnyis /
T02D1191:321a-32: brtag pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid bstan pa dang bshad par gnas pa'o //
T02D1191:321a-33: skye'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa
T02D1191:321a-34: ni rdo rje bdag med ma la sogs pa zhu
T02D1191:321a-36: / de yang dra ba ni thabs dang shes rab po //
T02D1191:321a-37: sdom pa ni phyag rgya chen por sdom pa'am rgyud 'dir sdom zhes bya'o //
T02D1191:321a-38: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdzogs so /
T02D1191:321a-40: // / bla ma dam pas rkyen byas so sor rtog pa'i nyer len gyis //
T02D1191:321a-41: slob ma dam pa 'ga' yis yang dang yang du gsol btab nas //
T02D1191:321a-42: rgyud kyi 'grel pa dka' don spyan 'byed bdag gis byas //
T02D1191:321a-43: 'di las bsod nams kyis ni rjes su 'brang dang
T02D1191:321a-44: sems can rdo rje 'dzin thob shog / rgyud kyi
T02D1191:321a-46: dgyes pa rdo rje'i dka' 'grel spyan 'byed ces bya
T02D1191:321a-47: ba slob dpon chen po mkhas pa dharmm'a k'i rtis
